creator: phil.weighill-smith@volantis.com
text:
It would be very nice if a filterset could be defined with nested 
propertysets. This would vastly simplify the authoring of build scripts that 
require filtering based on a set of properties. All propertyset features (such 
as prefix filtering, mappers etc.) add to the flexibility of this mechanism 
(which seems to me to be far more useful in a general sense than filter files).
